name: Monster Mashup (J-eno)
description:
This game was my senior project, made as part of a 5-man team, and is no longer in development.

It's not very clear in game, but you navigate the menus using the Arrow Keys and/or WASD. Spacebar to proceed to next screen. 

--KNOWN ISSUES--

I believe that I fixed the infinite loading screen bug. Everything should load in <30 seconds. Let me know if you are still experiencing the bug, and I will look into another fix. 

Playing in fullscreen on your browser introduces performance issues. If you would like to play in fullscreen, please download the executable 

Enjoy

-Joel
